sentence.Network_en: In time these new excavations will require conservation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些刚发掘出来的物品需要及时保护。

sentence.Network_en: Even well-meaning attempts at conservation can bring problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使是出于善意想开展自然保护也可能会引来麻烦。

sentence.Network_en: He is founding director of The Conservation Foundation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是自然资源保护基金会的创办负责人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... confess 坦白 conservation 保存 consolation 安慰.
托福词汇表_百度文库 ... insect 昆虫 conservation 保护 architect 建筑师.
守字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 守寡〖 remainawidow;liveinwidowhood〗 守恒〖 conservation〗 守候〖 expect〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... conserve v 保存；保守 conservation n 保存；保持 conservative a 保守的.

list.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... conservation n. 保护；保存 conserve vt. 保存，保藏 superior a. 较好的；优的.
conservatively 保守地conservator 保存器; 储存器-
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... consensus ? n. 一致,团结 conservative ? adj. 保守的 n.保守的人 conserve ? vt. 保存,保全.
* 保守(conservative) GC：没有分别严格管理指标器和数字值之存储器回收管理。此方法是如果它可以成为指标，那就以指标来看待它…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English(in the general sense 'conserving, preservation'): from Latin conservatio(n-), from the verb conservare (see conserve)

entry.def: Conservation is saving and protecting the environment.

example.ex: ...a four-nation regional meeting on elephant conservation.
example.tran: 四国保护大象的地区性会议
植树以及其他环保计划

entry.tran: (对文物或艺术品的) 保护
entry.def: Conservation is saving and protecting historical objects or works of art such as paintings, sculptures, or buildings.

example.ex: Then he began his most famous work, the conservation and rebinding of the Book of Kells...
example.tran: 之后他就开始了他最为出名的工作，即保护并重新装订《凯尔斯书》。

entry.def: The conservation of a supply of something is the careful use of it so that it lasts for a long time.

example.tran: 旨在促进节约能源的计划

example.ex: ...rules concerning the conservation of fishery resources.
example.tran: 有关保护渔业资源的规定

means.word_mean: 1. an occurrence of improvement by virtue of preventing loss or injury or other change
2. the preservation and careful management of the environment and of natural resources
3. (physics) the maintenance of a certain quantities unchanged during chemical reactions or physical transformations

auth_sentence.content: The research is published in the journal Conservation Letters.
auth_sentence.res_content: The research is published in the journal Conservation Letters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The research is published in the journal Conservation Letters.

auth_sentence.content: An active propagandist for the conservation of the forests.
auth_sentence.res_content: An active propagandist for the conservation of the forests.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An active propagandist for the conservation of the forests.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奴隶状态,惩役,地役权,使用权
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+itude状态→服务的状态→奴隶状态,惩役
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存
de加强+serv服务+e→加强服务→值得[重视]
dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害

stems_affixes.value_cn: 观察,观测,注意到,监视,遵守,评述,说
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强动作+serv保持+e→一直保持→遵守,引申为观察
pre预先+serv保留+e→预先保留→保存
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

Sentence.sentence: To stress the importance of energy conservation.
We tend to look on nature conservation as some kind of favour that human beings are granting to the natural world.
His writing and speaking raised the awareness of the importance of conservation and helped bring about our national park system.
The department of Environmental Conservation estimates the optimum population at 60.

sentences.cn: 她对保护环境这个问题十分关心。

jushi.chinese: 他对保护环境这个问题不关心。

jushi.english: The expensive fuel costs are forcing stepped-up conservation efforts by all airline companies.
jushi.chinese: 高昂的燃料费用迫使着所有的航空公司加强为防止浪费所做出的努力。
